greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 1's (or A's) in the Wythoff representation of n.
comment: See A135817 for references and links for the Wythoff representation for n>=1.
formula: a(n)= number of applications of Wythoff's A sequence A000201 needed in the unique Wythoff representation of n>=1.
xref: Cf. A135817 (lengths of Wythoff representation), A007895 (number of 0's (or B's) in the Wythoff representation).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_ Jan 21 2008
